com.bham.bd.entity

Class MovingEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.entity.MovingEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, GameCharacter

    public abstract class MovingEntity
extends BaseGameEntity
    Represents any entity that can move at any angle

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected MovingEntity(double x, double y, double maxSpeed)
      Constructs a single moving entity by default facing up (angle is set to 0), giving it a mass of 1 and generates a new valid ID for it
      protected MovingEntity(double x, double y, double maxSpeed, Point2D heading)
      Alternate constructor allowing to initialize a custom facing direction with a non-zero velocity

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovingEntity

        protected MovingEntity(double x,
                       double y,
                       double maxSpeed)
        Constructs a single moving entity by default facing up (angle is set to 0), giving it a mass of 1 and generates a new valid ID for it
        Parameters:
        x - top left x coordinate of the entity and its image
        y - top left y coordinate of the entity and its image
        maxSpeed - value which defines the initial velocity

      • MovingEntity

        protected MovingEntity(double x,
                       double y,
                       double maxSpeed,
                       Point2D heading)
        Alternate constructor allowing to initialize a custom facing direction with a non-zero velocity
        Parameters:
        x - top left x coordinate of the entity and its image
        y - top left y coordinate of the entity and its image
        maxSpeed - value which defines the initial velocity
        heading - basis vector indicating the direction the entity is facing

    • Method Detail

      • drawRotatedImage

        protected void drawRotatedImage(GraphicsContext gc,
                                Image image,
                                double angle)
        Draws an image on a graphics context

        The image is drawn at (x, y) rotated by angle pivoted around the point (centerX, centerY). It uses Rotate class form JavaFX which applies rotation using transform matrix.

        Parameters:
        gc - graphics context the image is to be drawn on
        angle - rotation angle
        See Also:
        docs.oracle.com

      • getSteering

        public Steering getSteering()
        Returns the Steering Object of Entity
        Returns:
        Steering Object of Entity

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Calculates the angle the entity is facing

        Note: the basis vector which is used for angle calculation must be (0, -1) as this is the way the entity in the image is facing (upwards).

        Returns:
        angle between 0 and 360 degrees the entity is facing

      • getMass

        public double getMass()
        Returns the mass this entity was assigned
        Returns:
        entity's mass

      • getMaxSpeed

        public double getMaxSpeed()
        Returns the maximum speed value this entity can reach
        Returns:
        maximum speed value of this entity

      • getMaxForce

        public double getMaxForce()
        Returns the maximum force this entity can have (used for acceleration)
        Returns:
        maximum force value the entity can have

      • getHeading

        public Point2D getHeading()
        Returns the normalized vector the entity is facing at
        Returns:
        Point2D object representing a direction vector the entity is facing

      • getVelocity

        public Point2D getVelocity()
        Returns the current velocity
        Returns:
        Point2D object representing a velocity vector the entity has

      • setMaxSpeed
